title: Border, 1736–96
medium:
Medium: silk 
Technique: embroidered (cross and double running stitches) on gauze weave
description: Strip embroidered with red and black silk using cross stitch and double running. Pattern showing people in architectural setting between two borders of conventionalized floral forms.
